b'RT @JonahLupton: @TylerTaggart1 $SHSP currently has a market cap around $205M so the company is trading at 7x LTM sales. \n\n$VERB appears to\xe2\x80\xa6'

b'@TylerTaggart1 $SHSP currently has a market cap around $205M so the company is trading at 7x LTM sales. 

$VERB appears to be trading at 7x LTM sales. 

But this is where you have to factor in $VERB\xe2\x80\x99s potential sales growth and weigh that against their big losses.'

b'@TylerTaggart1 SharpSpring ($SHSP) could be a decent comp for $VERB. 

$SHSP grew 28% in 2020 and is forecasted to grow 18% in 2021. 

$SHSP is current losing money but EBITDA margins have been improving to -10% for 2020 with 72% gross margins.'
